segments.text: Look at that boy, he's really going for it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on that wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the stool hasn't tipped over yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the jar and the other holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall, the floor is wet and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him seems to be waiting for a cookie, her hand is open and ready.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They both seem to be unaware of the danger they're in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they know how much trouble they could get into.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman by the sink is still oblivious, she hasn't noticed a thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think I should warn them, but I don't want to get them in trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is making me really anxious, someone could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
